choices: Matt decides to forget the gym and chill
Matt decides he should bulk up
Jason and Aaron plan to help Matt chill...AND gain weight
Take the story in the direction you want to
1.content:
The sun was beginning to rise over London's tall buildings, and light was beginning to pour into Matt's bedroom window. In time the blades of light woke Matt up from his slumber, breaking through his deep dreams of the days on stage in the band. Within seconds Matt came back to reality and remembered how his band had split just one month ago. The split was still painful to Matt, and he was in no mood to face the press once again.

With a stumble Matt picked his sculpted body out of bed, closed the blinds, and went back to bed.

Just minutes later Matt's phone began to ring, and woke him yet again.

'Hullo?'

'Hey Matt' the voice replied, and Matt recognized it as the voice of the bands previous manager, 'gotta rush but just to let you know we've been talking about you guys and we've decided we want to take you forward into a solo career!'

'I...I just, well, don't know what to say?!'

'No need to say anything Matt, just meet us at the studio tomorrow at 10am, sharp! Bye dude.'

'I'll be there! Thanks!'

Matt felt great! He decided it was time for a celebration. He got up, put on his 30'' jeans and tight muscle tee, and tidied up the flat. He invited his best mates Jason and Aaron over to share a pizza or three, a few beers and a glass or two of champagne.

Now that Matt didn't have to tour yet, and had light at the end of the tunnel with a solo career, he debating whether to take a month to relax. Things like forgetting the gym and eating whatever whenever for a while, to chill out. Then again if Matt's going to launch a solo career it might be good if he goes to the gym more and bulk up weight wise so that he can boast larger arm muscles at least!
1.title: Welcome to The Story of Matt's Gain

choices: Eats all the food and feels bloated
Just finishes the food when there's a knock at the door
11.content:
'Nah no way!' Matt thinks as he passes his gym bag on the way to the fridge. 'Can't be bothered today! They love me for my voice, im sure a few days of lounging before the tour can't do too much damage!'

With that matt pretty much empties his fridge onto a tray, making sandwiches, taking beers, milk, and everything else to the couch in front of the TV where he intends on staying all day.

Matt...
11.title: Matt decides to forget the gym and chill

choices: Theres A Knock At The Door
111.content: Eats all the food and feels bloated, he put his hand on his stomach and gave it a massage when..
111.title: Eats all the food and feels bloated

1112.content:
Feeling too full to get the phone, Matt continued massaging his swollen stomach. However the phone just kept ringing and ringing until Matt had had enough and decided to get the phone. Picking up the phone Matt recognised the voice of his manager.

Manager - "Hey Matt I just wanted the give you the good news. I got a call from a company about half an hour ago saying that they wanted to sponsor you and help fund your career in anyway possible. They said that you have the look that they were after or something like that..."
Matt - "That's fantastic! What's the company?"
Manager - "They're a bakery I believe. I was a little unsure about it, but judging by the amount of money they're going to be paying us, I could tell they really wanted this sponsorship. They did have some odd terms and conditions though. Essentially you just have to promote their products in any music videos you do."
Matt - "That sounds good to me. I just can't believe how well my career's going and it hasn't even been twenty four hours."
Manager - "Well I'm happy for you. I've got some guys coming in tomorrow who'll write some song lyrics for you first single. I'll call you when we're ready for you to start rehearsing."
Matt - "Okay thanks. Bye."
Manager - "Bye."

Matt was still taken a back by the news. His solo career was off to a flying start and he was very happy. It looked like he was going to have nothing to do for the next few weeks so without much deliberation Matt decided he'd relax and just watch TV and order takeaways for the meantime.
1112.title: The Phone Rings

11121.content:
*Two weeks later*

Pushing a couple of pizza boxes off himself Matt got up with a groan. Last night he'd ordered a couple of large pizzas and had eaten the lot. Patting his stomach Matt was unaware as it jiggled and bounced with each pat. Matt reached down to button up his jeans which had been tight around his swollen stomach. However as he tried to pull the the two flaps together he was greeted with an unexpected resistance. Slight confused Matt glanced down but had to rub his eyes to make sure he was seeing okay. Before him was the soft and doughy beginnings of his pot belly. Intrigued Matt poked and slapped it, surprised by how far he could poke his finger into it. Matt was able to grab a handful of flab which he shook disappointingly. As he let it drop, Matt's belly lay over his jeans. Matt tried to pull his jean flaps again and by sucking in his new gut as much as he could, was able to button them up. Unfortunately he now had a rather impressive muffin top that circled his waist and jiggled as he jumped up and down.

Matt forced him self to go and stand on his scale and was surprised when he saw that he'd gained..
11121.title: 2 weeks later

choices: His manger decides not to mention Matt's weight gain
His manager asks Matt how he gained so much weight in 3 weeks
111212.content:
Matt was surprised that he'd gained so much in only two weeks but not wanting to admit he'd just let himself go like that, held onto the thought that he'd still managed to fit into his jeans. And just like that, Matt forgot all about his weight gain and carried on eating just as much junk food as he had been. For Matt simply pushing any thoughts about getting fat to the back of his mind was enough to let him stay in denial about his gain.

After that Matt stuck to wearing sweat pants and a baggy jumper as they were more comfortable. As his clothes were no longer constrictive Matt was unaware that he was continuing to gain weight so just carried on eating and eating and eating...

***********************
*Another week later*
***********************

Bending over to pick up the bag of jam doughnuts he'd just dropped on the floor, Matt stuck his expanded rear in the air. This caused the already strained fabric of his sweat pants to be stretched tight across his butt, gathering a few stares from a passing group of women. Matt licked his lips and hurriedly grabbed a doughnut from the bag and took a large bite of it. As Matt began walking to the recording studio the first bite of that doughnut was replaced by the second and then the next doughnut until he'd eaten all six in the bag. A filling snack.

Arriving at the studio, the security guard had to ask Matt for ID as he barely recognized his new, expanded form. Matt now sported a noticeable double chin. Along with that chin had come some flabbier and jigglier arms, thick thighs that shook when he walked, a significantly more noticeable belly that hung of the waistband of Matt's sweatpants and a butt that was practically bursting out of clothes. Stunned to silence the guard let Matt into the studio where he met his manager for the first time in 3 weeks.
111212.title: 20 pounds

choices: I'm too fat, I need to loose weight
Fuck the manager, I feel great with my body
1112122.content:
"Wow dude, what the hell happened yo you?"
"Maybe I let myself go a bit"
"A bit? That looks that you're OBESE!"
"Its not that bad"
That teasing from his manager strangely get Matt turned on.
"You need to go on a strict diet, you can't show up like that"
"Ok"
Then Matt check the songs they have written for him, chooses one and begins recording it. After the session his manager gave him a sheet with the diet he's going to follow.
In his house, Matt gets undressed and admire his fatness and thought...
1112122.title: His manager asks Matt how he gained so much wei...

choices: the pizza delivery guy is one of the old roadies, a muscled stud!
Aaron has put on some weight!
Jason arrives with a girl on his arm...
Jason has put on some serious weight!
12.content:
Then again, if Matt's going to be launched in a solo career it might be good if he hits the gym to bulk up - at least have larger arms and shoulders to fill out the tight outfits on stage! Being bigger overall would probably be good - after all, look at those long-time successes "The Boss" Bruce Springsteen and Aaron Neville - neither of them skinny guys!

The first part of getting bigger, though, is to actually get bigger - more food in so the body can grow. With Jason and Aaron coming over, Matt is looking forward to more food - he'll have to make himself eat at first, but Aaron will help with that, Aaron's always had a 'good' appetite. And Jason will certainly help with the trips to the gym to turn the extra food into extra muscle...

Dreaming of having arms and a chest as big as some of the roadies who worked the band's last tour, Matt orders in pizzas. When asked if he wants mozzarella sticks, chicken wings or steamed mussels, he says yes to all three. He checks his beer supply, and slips out to the corner Tesco to stock up while the pizzas and the friends are on their way. He grabs some pastries too, and carts the load back to his place just minutes before the pizzas, Aaron and Jason show up.

When they do....
12.title: Matt decides he should bulk up

121.content:
Matt heard a knock at the door and he went to open the door. He saw a guy around his age and boy was he ripped. His unformed really showed off his large and strong muscular biceps and he notice that the shirt was tight around the chest as it covered a very defined pecs and Matt thought he saw some evidence of an eight pack. the pizza guy’s look strained he Matt saw how big his legs were as the jeans showed his muscular calves. He looked like a bodybuilder He saw the guy single handedly holding up the pizzas boxes in one hand. The pizza guy had short brown eyes and blue eyes.

“You Matt who ordered the pizza?” said the pizza guy.

“Yep.” said Matt as he replied and payed the pizza man.

“Thanks hope you enjoy the food. This house looks familiar one of my friends just live in this house and was a singer.” Said the pizza guy as looked at the house.

“Well I am a singer. Wait are you Mark Smith?” said Matt

“Matt man is that you?” said the pizza guy who was now identified as Mark smith. Mark were one of Matt’s first groupie and one of Matt’s true friend. Mark support Matt
and when Matt made it became more and more famous Mark slowly disappeared and left as he saw his friend swept away in the wave of stardom.

“Yes man you look so different.” Said Matt as he remembers Mark as a big fat guy who was nerdy but did share many things in common with Matt.

“Aye once you hit it big I figure that I would get on with my life. My uncle owns the local gyms and I hit the gym and I lost the fat and got my new muscular body. “said Mark as he struck a pose.

“You look good man. Say I am trying to bulk up do you have any tips?” said Matt.

“I do, but can it wait for another time. I still some pizza to deliver. Here’s my number call me if you have some free time. “said Mark as he pulled out a piece of paper with
a phone number on it and handed the pizzas to Matt.

Matt waved to Marked as got into the delivery car and drove off. Matt then closed the door and opened up the pizzas and smelled the tantalizing aroma come from the
pizzas. His mouth began to water.

He heard a knock at the door and he opened it up and it was…
121.title: the pizza delivery guy is one of the old roadie...

122.content:
There's a knock at the door and you (matt) get a little excited, you can't wait to share the news with the boys that you're going to be embarking upon a solo career. When you open the door Jason is stood there with a couple of bags of food and drink.

'You said you had something to celebrate so we decided to bring some celebration food and drink, if that's OK with you?' said Jason.

'Of course, but I've already got some here. Im sure with Aarons ability to eat and eat and not gain any weight he'll help us polish some of it off. Where is he?'

'He's just getting the other bags from the car ... you might have a surprise!'

Just then Aaron appears with several bags of food and a couple of packs off beer. He has had his hair cut, and it looks amazing. Blonde medium length hair sweeping across from left to right and spiked up a little at the back. It really brings out his eyes. Then you look a little further down and realise there's something a little different about him.

He has certainly put on a little weight. You pat his small but noticeable belly and say

'where did this come from?'

'I guess my appetite is catching up with me, but I can control it! I've only gained ...
122.title: Aaron has put on some weight!

choices: Matt decides to work out with Aaron
1222.content:
It's only 14 pounds but I have been slacking off.
Matt watched his friend unload the food all the while talking about how he would be getting back in shape. Aaron was always hot but that little bit of bulk and softness really looked good.

Aaron continued laying out a selection of deli treats then started unpacking a selection of pastries. Then he grabbed a bowl of chips and plopped down in an easy chair.

"What's the news?"

When Matt shared his new career plans, both Jason and Aaron were excited for him.

As Matt continued he watched Aaron vacuum up the treats he had just unloaded.

"So when are you planning to cut back?" Jason asked.

"I didn't say I was cutting back," Aaron replied. "I plan to shape up. I put in a heavy workout this morning. If I don't eat big I will just waste away to skin and bones like Matt here. Now that you are going solo, you need some more muscle to pump up your appearance. You ought to work out with me."
1222.title: 14lbs

12221.content:
Aaron's offer is just what Matt was waiting to hear.
"You know," he told Aaron. "I've decided that I need some more muscle now that I'm going solo. It doesn't hurt when the chicks think you are hot."
"You are right about that!" Aaron replied. "But you don't have any meat to build muscle. You need to start eating big if you want to bulk up. Let me give you a few pointers."
Aaron lectured Matt all the while packing in more food.
"Tell you what," he concluded. "Just follow my example. Start with
12221.title: Matt decides to work out with Aaron

choices: Jason and Aaron want to help.
124.content:
"Hi guys." Matt greets his buds with a big hug, "Good to see you. Grab some beer and make yourselves at home."
The boys settle in and Matt watches his friends. He is surprised to notice that Aaron is still the same chunky guy, the formerly hard bodied Jason is looking a bit pudgy too. Where he was always a healthy eater and not much of a pizza and beer guy, he was giving Aaron a run for his money.
Matt thought that between his two friends, one with a big appetite and the other a fitness freak, he would get the perfect mix of ying and yang. He'd get help with eating more to add some bulk to his body and a workout buddy to make sure that the new pounds were muscle. As the afternoon continued both his buds vacuumed up the food. Matt watched in amazement when Jason put down his plate and fumbled under a round ball of belly to unbutton his stressed jeans.

"AAAAH," he sighed and drained his beer. "That's more like it." He rubbed the mound and smiled.
"You gonna share, fatboy?"
Aaron shoved a pizza across to Jason.
"Watch who you're calling fatboy. I'm not the one popping out of my pants. I think you are about one pizza short of a full blowout."
"Ah, let up chubby. You know that I'm just bulking right now. It is so much easier to add the weight and then convert it to muscle. It was hell just getting to 185 and 5 % fat and nothing seemed to get me higher with the heavy workouts. I just couldn't get enough calories to bulk up. So I just laid off the workouts and started eating just like you. Three months and I'm up 30 pounds. When I get back on the program, I'll probably settle at 210 or so with 5%. You'll still be 250 and 30%."
"Whatever!" Aaron got up to get another beer and slapped Jasons gut on the way. It quivered softly.
"That's no 5%." He laughed.
"That's great!" Matt took some pizza. "Because I want to beef up some for the tour. Girls like some muscle in the chest and arms. I guess I'm looking for a bulking phase too. Gotta eat more and start working out so I was looking for you two guys to inspire and encourage me. You know I'm not much of an eater and I've never worked out. I need lots of help."
Matt hope that both of his friends can move in to help him get bigger.
Are they both available?
124.title: Jason has put on some serious weight!

choices: Take this story in another direction
13.content:
Jason and Aaron decide to fatten their friend up and to help him relax 100%!

The very next day, Jason brings the food and Aaron brings the beer, and the two start on their crusade to help Matt relax.

3 pizzas, 12 Mars Bars, 6 tubs of ice cream and 18 beers later, and the three lads are stuffed. Jason and Aaron had eaten just as much as Matt, a sacrifice they were willing to take to help their friend gain the pounds.

The lads decide to rope in another friend to help out, but leave out the 'making Matt gain' part. His name is Danny and he is perhaps worthy of a story himself...

Jason is very muscled and has a very low fat percentage, and a very high metabolism.

Aaron is slim and has a large appetite, which he has kept in control until now.
13.title: Who gains

131.content:
Aaron was gay and loved Matt, however Aaron was greatly turned off by Matt’s stick figure form. Aaron was also concerned that Matt was under the healthy body fat percentile to get himself to squeeze into those 30 inch jeans. He was also afraid of telling Matt his passions, as it could ruin a good friendship they had. It would be a little awkward to be friends if Matt knew Aaron loved him while Aaron knew that Matt only thought of him as a friend. Aaron had told Jason about the plan to fatten Matt, but Jason believed it was just some fun joke. Jason always had a twisted sense of humor.

The three had each fallen asleep in Matt’s dorm. Matt woke up first to find his arms wrapped around Aaron. Matt had loved Aaron, but he was worried and frightened about how Aaron would react if Matt told the truth. Matt also enjoyed Aaron as a friend and was worried that the revelation of his affectation might ruin their amity. Matt managed to maneuver his muscular arms off Aaron without waking his friend. Matt felt a major hangover settling in, and it was only two in the afternoon of the same day. Through the haze of the head pains, he got to the kitchen.

Matt then got into his fridge, feeling painfully hungry again. He looked around and spotted some leftovers that were turning green. He pitched these, not wanting to eat them again in another drunken state. He then spotted some ice cream and a fresh few things of sushi. Did Matt eat the sushi or the ice cream?
131.title: Two Lovers who Don't Know It

134.content:
Danny is a young athletic student at college in London. Growing up in a health conscious world was tough, yet the city lifestyle had suited Danny down to the ground. Party, gym, party, college, party, food, party, football, party, girls, party, boys, party party party!!!

Danny has just turned 19 and is starting his second year of sports science at college. He, like many of his mates, LOVES the student life he encounters each day. The beer, the girls (and boys – Danny is bisexual), the parties, the food, the football, the gym. The latter two are two of the things that Danny has begun to forget over the past few weeks. The gym, no matter how important it once was, has become the ‘if I’ve got time’ thing. Football was a main factor in his life, but this year the same old ‘hero of the game’ thing has gotten Danny down. He was ready to relax, for a change!
134.title: Danny

choices: Phone the manager and decline the offer
14.content:
'Nah, forget it!'

Matt decided that he was a singer, not a bodybuilder. He would take it easy before arriving back onto the music scene. After all, he had been stressed and upset since the band finished. He had loved playing and singing in a band, even though he had never got on with any of the other members. They were all brainless fitness freaks, and they teased him for being a skinny shrimp. In a way, he was glad not to see them anymore.

I'll just enjoy myself and not give a shit until I begin my solo career, he thought.
14.title: Take it easy

info.brief_description: Matt's solo singing career causes more than a gain in fans ...
info.description:
Welcome to The Story of Matt's Gain

Matt is a 20 year-old lad from england, and for the past 3 years has been touring in a rock band. Just one month ago however, the group decided to call it a day and split. Matt was picked up by the previous record label and will be re-launched in several months time ...

During this time matt has a lot to do, such as film a video, write more songs and record his new album. No touring yet, not using the gym as much, more food and a less healthy diet ... it begins to show!

Read, add and join in as we watch Matt's gain ... Enjoy!
